name: Cyber Shooter (Lubaszek)
description:
You can play as one of the three available characters, where each one has different abilities.
The purpose of the game is to defeat enemies in rooms which are procedurally generated. 
Every next room will be occupied by stronger enemies. Also you can collect money to upgrade your weapon to finally fight a boss.

Controls
W - Forward
S - Backward
A - Left
D - Right
Space - jump
Q - drop the bomb
Esc - Game Menu
Tab - Stats
Left Mouse Button - Shot
